mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM chatting_room_parti A, chatting_room B WHERE A.chatting_room_num = B.chatting_room_num AND A.member_id = #{member_Id}
select ch_content from (select CH_CONTENT FROM CHATTING WHERE CHATTING_ROOM_NUM=#{chatroom_num} ORDER BY CHATTING_NUM) where rownum=1
select chatting_room_title from chatting_room where chatting_room_num=#{chatroom}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATTING (CHATTING_NUM, CHATTING_ROOM_NUM, MEMBER_ID,CH_CONTENT, CH_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_CHATTING.nextval, #{room}, #{senderName}, #{message}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
INSERT INTO CHATTING_ROOM (CHATTING_ROOM_NUM, CHATTING_ROOM_TITLE, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (SEQ_CHATTING_ROOM.nextval, #{chatting_Room_title}, #{member_Id})
INSERT INTO CHATTING_ROOM_PARTI (PARTI_NUM, CHATTING_ROOM_NUM, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (SEQ_CHATTING_ROOM_PARTI.nextval, SEQ_CHATTING_ROOM.currval, #{member_Id})
mapper.select: select * from chatting where chatting_room_num=#{roomnum} order by ch_date asc
select member_id from chatting_room_parti where chatting_room_num=#{roomnum}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CHATTING_ROOM_PARTI WHERE CHATTING_ROOM_NUM = #{chatting_Room_num} AND MEMBER_ID = #{member_Id}
